A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst star wars movie ever. It's so incredibly cheesy and filled with black hole sized subplots. In fact many of the subplots from the Force Awakens are just dropped entirely. There are just so many bad things happening in this movie I cannot number them all\, but certainly the most cringe worthy one is when Poe drops to his knees to give his droid a belly rub... Jar Jar Binks come back we forgive you!
